Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal was hit by a comebacker off the bat of Brenton Doyle in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Skubal said he is fine after being hit by the comebacker, but will have more tests done
Initial X-rays look to be negative for Skubal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers lost to the Colorado Rockies, but still won the series
The Tigers need all they can get from Skubal as they approach the playoffs
Others: The Tigers have a huge series against the Baltimore Orioles coming up
